short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download the gallery of Desmos sketches (unofficial)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will download student sketches from the Desmos Dashboard. This allows you to show off student work anonymously in other contexts. See screenshots for details on how to use.
